abstract.shortdesc: List items can contain words, short expressions, sentence segments or full sentences. Rules differ based on the type of content.

rule.rule-statement: Do not use punctuation marks at the end of <li> content except for full sentences.

ul.li: It makes conditional filtering simpler, especially when the punctuation of the last list item would be different from others.
It adapts better to small formats such as smartphones.
If punctuation must be added, the transformation process can be implemented to handle it and adapt the rules for different locales.
